qas.question: The Theravada school spread south from india in what century BCE?
The Dharmagupta schol spread in what century to Kashmir?

context: The Theravada school spread south from India in the <a0_0><a1_0>3rd century<a1_0/><a0_0/> BCE, to Sri Lanka and Thailand and Burma and later also Indonesia. The Dharmagupta school spread (also in 3rd century BCE) north to Kashmir, Gandhara and Bactria (Afghanistan).
